subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Simmons, the 6-foot-10 freshman superstar, may play only one college season before turning pro, and the 4-4 Tigers look far from being an N.C.A.A. tournament team.
snippet: Simmons, the 6-foot-10 freshman superstar, may play only one college season before turning pro, and the 4-4 Tigers look far from being an N.C.A.A. tournament team.
